timeline.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
timeline.description: Leading development of enterprise-scale web applications using modern tech stack.
highlights: Built and deployed 5+ high-traffic applications serving 100K+ users
Mentored junior developers and established coding best practices
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%
Led migration from legacy systems to modern cloud architecture

timeline.title: Full-Stack Developer
timeline.description: Developed and maintained complex web applications for various client projects.
highlights: Delivered 20+ client projects on time and within budget
Improved application performance by 40% through optimization
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environment
Implemented responsive designs ensuring cross-browser compatibility

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Specialized in creating engaging user interfaces and optimizing user experience.
highlights: Developed mobile-first responsive websites for 30+ clients
Reduced page load times by 60% through image and code optimization
Created reusable component library used across multiple projects
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs

timeline.title: Computer Science Degree
timeline.description: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with focus on software engineering.
highlights: Graduated Summa Cum Laude with 3.9 GPA
Led student programming club with 100+ members
Completed senior capstone project on machine learning
Participated in multiple hackathons winning 2nd place twice
